name: joi box 3000 (i3-10100/8gb/256gb/dos)
description:
Product Features:
• Process high quality digital media with synchronised playback
• Supports dual display with 4K Ultra HD
• Industrial grade signage, designed for long-term operation and function in mind
• Run content seamlessly in just a few clicks
• Running Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
• Flexible placement (Included VESA mount that can mount behind the monitor, Provided stand that can put as tower on flat surface)

Product Specifications:
• Intel Core i3-10100 Processor
• 8GB DDR4 2666MHz (Dual channel support up to 64GB)
• 256GB SATA III SSD (1x Key M (2280) with PCIe x4 and SATA3 for SSD, 1x SATA3 (6Gb/s))
• Intel UHD Graphics 630
• Supports dual display, 1x HDMI 1.4b, 1x DP 1.4a, 1x VGA
• With Wi-Fi and Bluetooth
• 19V/90W AC-DC power brick adapter x1
• 2 Year Warranty

Package Contents:
• JOI Box 3000 x1
